text: Galina Evgenievna Nikolaeva (Russian: Гали́на Евге́ньевна Никола́ева) (18 February 1911, in Usmanka, Tomsk – 18 October 1963, in Moscow), maiden name Volyanskaya, was a Soviet writer. She was awarded the Stalin Prize in 1951 for her novel Harvest. == References == Category:20th-century Russian women writers Category:Soviet women writers Category:1911 births Category:1963 deaths
title: Galina Nikolaeva
